full_text: The United States has its first confirmed case of a new virus that appeared in Wuhan, China, last month, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced. The virus has already sickened hundreds and killed six people in Asia. https://t.co/lL2xqmPira
JUST IN: More than 440 cases of coronavirus are now confirmed in China and the death toll from the outbreak has risen to 9 people, China’s deputy health commissioner says. https://t.co/xTWIhjofAr
description: Canadian & Sri Lankan. Living in Punkuditivu, Vavuniya, Mattaclipu, Sri Lanka. Saivite (Hinduism) messenger to the GODS of the golden PENIS.
